usefulItems: bowl, loaf tin (25 x 9 x 11 cm), plastic wrap, oven
title: Sun-dried tomato and pepita bread

ingredients.content: 40 g Parmesan cheese, crust removed and cut into pieces (3 cm)
40 g pepitas, plus extra for sprinkling
400 g water, plus extra for sprinkling

preparations.content: Place Parmesan cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place sun-dried tomatoes into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place buckwheat and rice into mixing bowl and mill <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add arrowroot, chia seeds, pepitas, xanthan gum and salt and mix <b>6 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place water, coconut sugar, yeast, oil, vinegar and eggs into mixing bowl and heat <b>2 min/37°C/speed 2<b>, then mix <b>15 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add tomato paste and reserved buckwheat flour mixture and mix <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>.

Add reserved sun-dried tomatoes and half of the grated Parmesan cheese, then knead <b>1 min/<b>. Pour batter into a loaf tin (25 x 9 x 11 cm), cover with plastic wrap and leave to prove (approx. 1 hour).
Preheat oven to 210°C. Sprinkle loaf with water, poppy seeds and remaining grated Parmesan cheese and set aside for 10 minutes. Bake for 35 minutes (210°C), or until golden. Serve warm or cold.
